item.description: The Patrons Details: Aliance Name: The Patrons Ship: 03 - Thorn We usually hangs out on Block 26! Alliance Type: Roleplay Alliance Time Zone: CEST About: Most of us are very gay. üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà Members: Nora Honora (Leader) Equinox Lilit Gaia Stellaria Gogo Mes
Characters: From The Patrons : Nora Honora (Leader) Equinox Lilit Lichenaes Gaia Stellaria Gogo Mes Unaffiliated: Yokai

Equinox Personality: Equinox shows basic emotion around others while her Light Personality is in control and finds it incredibly difficult to trust people other than Nox(Dark Personality) and she rather that she keep to herself so that past events don‚Äôt repeat themselves. Due to her job as an ARKs operative, she has learned to open up to fellow operatives more easily. While her Dark Personality is in control, she shows immense distrust to people around her other than Light and sometimes an occasional bout of anger if anyone is too pushy getting close to her.

Gaia Stellaria ‘‘I don’t know what I am doing, just making stuff up as I go and I am pretty good at that.'' Details: Name: Tianea ‘Gaia’ Stellaria Race: Self gene-spliced Newman Height: 180 cms Age: 30 years old (as of episode 5) Gender: Woman Occupation/Archetype: Explorer, Scientist, Engineer, Recon Weaponry: Generally equipped with a prototype she made herself. Often a form of ranged weapon or knuckle weapons.

Nora Honora “Did someone say fire? No…? …must’ve misheard tea - coming up!~” Details: Name: Nora Honora Race: Gene-spliced Deuman (Deuman-cat mix) Height: 155 cms Age: 17 years old Gender: Woman Occupation/Archetype: Bartender, ARKs defender, Ranger/gunner Pronouns: She/He/They Personality: Nora could be characterized as a plethora of things; many would say that she’s a neurotic piece of work that is crude, mischievous and snarky.
